item.description:
See Gloria's Walk Along the Windsor Locks Canal, in the hartford hike section....She is having a good light walk along the canal a few miles from this paddle at 3 pm.
Since this paddle location is right on my way to the hike..and on the way home....might as well stop and fit in a short paddle..either upstream for a while or downstream to the CT river. Dont matter to me..
If someone is interested after the hike and some dinner...can do a sunset trip here too... Bring some Pine Wooden Steak Bug Spray...Vampire Mosquetoes
come out at night
This part of the river is usually slow, and sometimes a little faster depending on the upstream dam release...
anyone can paddle upstream even during the release for a good long ways...
..


Getting there:
From north or south..
Take I 91 exit 37 in Windsore, go EAST on rte 305= Bloomfield ave for apx 1 mile where it ends and runs into rte 75=Poquonock ave. Take a right onto rte 75 for a short distance and then a left onto rte 159=Palasido ave. Go under the train bridge then take the first left turn=Pleasant ST.
Look right for the first buildings one of them is BARTS
Go a bit past the front and head to the back lot.
The boat launch is down from there to the river.
I have the blue toyota avalon and trailer with 2 yaks on it. if there is not enough room i unhook the trailer.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Paddle before or after Gloria's Hike
